attributes.action: A Free Vote Without the threat of The Three Rule Whip for the REferendum of withdrawing from The EU Totally
attributes.additional_details:
As title states "A free vote without the threat of the three rule whip" which underminds the the true role of the elected MPs.
 A FREE VOTE means A FREE VOTE WITHOUT BEING TOLD HOW TO VOTE.

rejection.details: Whipping is a matter for political parties and not HM Government.
